com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class IconFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.IconFactory

  • public final class IconFactory
extends Object
    Factory for creating Icons from bitmap images.

    icon is used to display bitmaps on top of the map using Marker and MarkerView.

    See Also:
    Icon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Bitmap ICON_MARKERVIEW_BITMAP 
      static String ICON_MARKERVIEW_ID

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Icon defaultMarker()
      Provides an icon using the default marker icon used for Marker.
      Icon defaultMarkerView()
      Provides an icon using the default marker icon used for MarkerView.
      Icon fromAsset(String assetName)
      Creates an Icon using the name of a Bitmap image in the assets directory.
      Icon fromBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
      Creates an icon from a given Bitmap image.
      Icon fromFile(String fileName)
      Create an Icon using the name of a Bitmap image file located in the internal storage.

      Creates an Icon using the absolute file path of a Bitmap image.
      Icon fromResource(int resourceId)
      Creates an icon using the resource ID of a Bitmap image.
      static IconFactory getInstance(Context context)
      Get a single instance of IconFactory.
      static Icon recreate(String iconId, Bitmap bitmap)

        public Icon fromBitmap(@NonNull
                       Bitmap bitmap)
        Creates an icon from a given Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - image used for creating the Icon.
        Returns:

      • fromResource

        public Icon fromResource(@DrawableRes
                         int resourceId)
        Creates an icon using the resource ID of a Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The resource ID of a Bitmap image.
        Returns:
        The icon that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.

      • defaultMarker

        public Icon defaultMarker()
        Provides an icon using the default marker icon used for Marker.
        Returns:
        An icon with the default Marker icon.

      • defaultMarkerView

        public Icon defaultMarkerView()
        Provides an icon using the default marker icon used for MarkerView.
        Returns:
        An icon with the default MarkerView icon.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Icon that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.

      • fromPath

        public Icon fromPath(@NonNull
                     String absolutePath)
        Creates an Icon using the absolute file path of a Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        absolutePath - The absolute path of the Bitmap image.
        Returns:
        The Icon that was loaded from the absolute path or null if failed to load.

      • fromFile

        public Icon fromFile(@NonNull
                     String fileName)
        Create an Icon using the name of a Bitmap image file located in the internal storage. In particular, this calls Context#openFileInput(String).
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the Bitmap image file.
        Returns:
        The Icon that was loaded from the asset or null if failed to load.
        See Also:
        Using the Internal Storage

      • recreate

        public static Icon recreate(@NonNull
                            String iconId,
                            @NonNull
                            Bitmap bitmap)
        Create an Icon using a previously created icon identifier along with a provided Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        iconId - The Icon identifier you'd like to recreate.
        bitmap - a Bitmap used to replace the current one.
        Returns:
        The Icon using the new Bitmap.
